title: This Game Doesn't Punish Death Threats?
body: The image shone was only a section which was not the most extreme thing said, first of all a person I feel like my right got taken away from me being called an it, however the kog player has given me various death threats as well as saying " why don't you die " also riot please check chat log he has told me to "Kill Yourself" and continued after telling him to stop it, riot what are you doing letting people receive zero punishment? this is unjust treatment.{{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body:
Are you just assuming he wasn't punished or do you have proof?

I mean, it's not like riot are going to come down and smite his ass mid game in front of you..
How do you know he hasn't received chat bans or warnings since then?

First of all when my friend used that word one game he got banned 2 weeks, this person 0 ban or suspensions.

Don't be so upset!   You are not alone!!!!!!!!!!     Riot does not punish death threats.............  NOR ANYTHING ELSE EITHER!!!!!!!!    It's no big deal.   Just ask them.     They don't give a fuck.    I've been reporting the same afk / troll players in Arams for the past four years and yet they continue playing... what more proof do we need that riot doesn't give a flying fuck about any poor behaviours!    They have an 'automated' reporting system that 'punishes' 1 player out of every 50,000,   the rest are free to say and do as they fucking well please.  The sooner you realise this the better you will feel and the less stress (possibly) you will experience as you soon become numb to the constant trolls/afks/ abuse/etc etc that inhabit this game,   and as you begin to realise that it's continually the same group of players that do this week after week without any consequences and then you will understand what a complete joke the riot reporting system actually is.     Just mute every player in every game you play in and that will make you almost oblivious to all the fuckwits in Lol (except the continual afkers who inhabit 80% of games)   GOOD LUCK!!!!!!!!!,  You'll need it.    If all else fails go find an online game where the developers actually care about their players enjoyment and take action against the fuckwits who constantly  spoil others' fun.    
HINT   -   it isn't riot.
